name: Earth's Core
description:

 =  =  =  =  =  Description  =  =  =  =  =

As the Earth cools, and life in the village is in danger, your father sends you on a mission to travel through the Earth's layers. Once you are there, you must chose how to heat up the Earth's Core once more.

 =  =  =  =  =  Project  =  =  =  =  =

This game was made using the Bitsy engine as part of the Game & Play course at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. https://gamedesignue.itch.io/

Learning to use the engine and creating the game took 1 week.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai   (WinterSemester 2020/21)
